title: Santiago Echavarría
text: Santiago Echavarría Passos (born 25 January 1999) is a Colombian <a href="association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="Las%20Vegas%20Lights%20FC">Las Vegas Lights</a> in the <a href="USL%20Championship">USL Championship</a> as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a>.
